title: Magazine Ad, "Tearsheet of magazine ad for Schlumberger Sonic Log", 1958
medium: Lithography in green, black, orange and grey ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted vertically in the upper right in black ink: Elaine Lustig
At upper left in green: SCHLUMBERGER SONIC LOG
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The ad shows blocks of color depicting the earth and a T cutting down through the earth simulating their product. The T is also the first letter of an equation. Under the equation is a line depicting a wave in the earth.

tombstone.epitaph:
Magazine Ad, "Tearsheet of magazine ad for Schlumberger Sonic Log", 1958.
1958. Lithography in green, black, orange and grey ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-123.
